text: Leda! Marokasari ayana mim'malni samudranloki tisukoni poyi - mi krtaghnataku phalitanga - mi mida tivramaina tuphanu galini pampi, mim'malni munci veyakunda suraksitanga undanivvagaladani bhavistunnara? Appudu maku virud'dhanga sahayapade varinevvarini miru pondaleru. Mariyu vastavaniki memu adam santatiki gauravamu nosangamu. Mariyu variki nela midanu, samudram lonu, prayanam koraku vahanalanu prasadincamu. Mariyu memu variki parisud'dhamaina vastuvulanu jivanopadhiga samakurcamu. Mariyu memu srstincina enno pranulapai variki pratyeka pradhan'yata niccamu
